channel.title: [iClarity]xEpicz - Dreams become true
channel.description:
[img]http://img407.imageshack.us/img407/6290/ehee.gif[/img]
Hello. This was my project. I couldn't finish it, was too hard, because I was the only one working on this. This source is called xEpicz, based off iClarity, a 317 loading 459 gameframe with custom interfaces.
[code]
public void process() { if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - Update) > 200) { Update = System.currentTimeMillis(); processTimers(); } if ((System.currentTimeMillis() - Update) > 200) { animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis(); processTimers(); } } [/code]
Server Features:
[ul][li]A perfect Combat base, with near perfect timers, and a perfect formula ![/li] [li]A magic base, with working ancients and modern magicks[/li] [li]A ranging system, supporting bows, knifes, darts..[/li] [li]Fletching system supporting all bows and arrow shafts[/li] [li]Crafting system supporting leathers[/li] [li]A firemaking base, needs to add the forcewalk and clipping[/li] [li]Filling vials from founts[/li] [li]Prayer on Altar - ItemOnObject - with anims, gfx, XP[/li] [li]Easter Ring[/li] [li]Ring of Stone[/li] [li]Monkey Degrees[/li] [li]Dragon Treasure = Needs work[/li] [li]100% Duel Arena[/li] [li]100% Barrows with killcounts, hint arrows, chests[/li] [li]90% Varrock - added almost all npcs, all shops with interfaces, makeovers, fur traders, etc..[/li] [li]Jad with 63 Waves[/li] [li]A teleporting sidebar interface[/li] [li]An event manager[/li] [li]Dragon Battleaxe, Dragon mace, Dragon longsword specials[/li] [li]Genie lamp[/li] [li]Doors system[/li] [li]NPC Dialogue with options[/li] [li]PLAYER Dialogues[/li] [li]First/Second/Third Object/NPC clicks/options [/li] [li]and more more more..[/li][/ul]
Pictures:
Tutorial Island NPC Dialogue - After 3 Dialogues you get teleported to Home(Edgeville) and you get a help book. [img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/5372/tutorialisland.png[/img] Pickpocketing [img]http://img8.imageshack.us/img8/700/pickpocketing.png[/img] Banking with Options, dialogues [img]http://img684.imageshack.us/img684/1411/banker.png[/img] Filling vials from fountains [img]http://img231.imageshack.us/img231/2246/fillingvials.png[/img] Jad with 56 waves! [img]http://img691.imageshack.us/img691/6356/jadwithwaves.png[/img] Smelting [img]http://img703.imageshack.us/img703/773/smelting.png[/img] Fletching [img]http://img819.imageshack.us/img819/3658/fletching.png[/img] Fletching anims [img]http://img194.imageshack.us/img194/2316/fletchingwithemotes.png[/img] Horvik [img]http://img217.imageshack.us/img217/5241/horvik.png[/img] Dragon battleaxe [img]http://img59.imageshack.us/img59/6645/dbaxespecial.png[/img] Perfect DDS Special [img]http://img4.imageshack.us/img4/48/dragondagger.png[/img] Perfect Blitz-DDS [img]http://img585.imageshack.us/img585/3629/perfectddsblitz.png[/img] Custom teleporting sidebar Interface [img]http://img695.imageshack.us/img695/5986/teleportsidebarinterfac.png[/img] Ring of Stone [img]http://img84.imageshack.us/img84/2033/ringofstone.png[/img] Easter Ring [img]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/7751/easterring.png[/img] Monkey Degrees [img]http://img717.imageshack.us/img717/6468/monkeydegrees.png[/img] Bones on Altar [img]http://img89.imageshack.us/img89/4814/bonesonaltar.png[/img] Barrows! [img]http://img706.imageshack.us/img706/3799/barrowsin.png[/img] Firemaking [img]http://img827.imageshack.us/img827/5310/firemakingt.png[/img] Genie Lamp [img]http://img685.imageshack.us/img685/2749/lampv.png[/img] Crafting [img]http://img801.imageshack.us/img801/1706/crafting.png[/img]
[b]Credits:[/b]
[ul][li][b]I Roll Deep [/b][/li] [li][b]Primadude[/b][/li][/ul]

item.title: [iClarity]xEpicz - Dreams become true
item.dc:creator: @I_Roll_Deep I Roll Deep
item.description:
@I_Roll_Deep wrote:

[quote=“itsteky, post:120, topic:413473”]What kind of source is this? Is it a PI or delta or what? cause im trying to code it with tutorials i get from moparscape forums and i cant find anything in the files that match the tutorials.[/quote]This is iClarity based. You can search for iClarity tutorials, or try converting some stuff from delta.

[quote=“itsteky, post:124, topic:413473”]Ok so what kind of tutorials should i be looking for?[/quote]Delta/iClarity. Some of the tutorials will need converting[quote=“Native^, post:123, topic:413473”]This is RuneSource.[/quote]No brah its iClarity

[quote=“itsteky, post:122, topic:413473”]But i keep trying tutorials for PI and it doesnt have half the sutff. Like i just tried to add a slayer point system and c.slayerTask isnt even in npchandler.java like it says it should be… I also tried to look for that code somewhere in other files but there was nothing… I think its like PI mixed with 317 or something… COULD THE OWNER PLEASE TELL ME =p[/quote]Bro it’s because this has nothing to do with PI.it’s iclarity, read about the server before downloading…

Read full topic
